tasks.dev: deno task build && cd env && deno run -P=required --watch ../dist/main.js
tasks.build:native: deno task prebuild && deno compile -A -o build/logthing ./dist/main.js
tasks.build:native:win32-x64: deno task prebuild && deno compile -A --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc -o build/logthing-win32-x64.exe ./dist/main.js
tasks.build:native:linux-x64: ddeno task prebuild && deno compile -A --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o build/logthing-linux-x64 ./dist/main.js
tasks.build:native:darwin-x64: deno task prebuild && deno compile -A --target x86_64-apple-darwin -o build/logthing-darwin-x64 ./dist/main.js
tasks.build:native:darwin-arm64: deno task prebuild &&6 deno compile -A --target aarch64-apple-darwin -o build/logthing-darwin-arm64 ./dist/main.js
tasks.build:native:all: deno task clean:build && deno task build:native:win32-x64 && deno task build:native:linux-x64 && deno task build:native:darwin-x64 && deno task build:native:darwin-arm64
